languages.text: "Тем более, что удача, кажется, отвернулась от Его Светлости Винтерскейла. На нескольких его мирах вспыхнули бунты, но он, кажется, и не думает их гасить. Зато Вольный Торговец подверг жестокой расправе Везувию Секундус, одну из старейших своих колоний, которую уличил в изменнических настроениях. Странно, но нашим агентам так и не удалось найти никаких доказательств существования там ростков мятежа. Как только нам станет известно нечто новое — вы узнаете об этом перв{mf|ым|ой}". {n}Клеменциа опускает взгляд на инфопластину.{/n} "И последнее".

traits.locale_text: "Тем более, что удача, кажется, отвернулась от Его Светлости Винтерскейла. На нескольких его мирах вспыхнули бунты, но он, кажется, и не думает их гасить. Зато Вольный Торговец подверг жестокой расправе Везувию Секундус, одну из старейших своих колоний, которую уличил в изменнических настроениях. Странно, но нашим агентам так и не удалось найти никаких доказательств существования там ростков мятежа. Как только нам станет известно нечто новое — вы узнаете об этом перв{mf|ым|ой}". {n}Клеменция опускает взгляд на инфопластину.{/n} "И последнее".
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Especially since His Lordship Winterscale's luck seems to be running out. Riots have broken out on several of his worlds, and yet, he has shown no intention of quelling them. Instead, the Rogue Trader inflicted brutal punishment upon one of his oldest colonies, Vesuvia Secundus, based on allegations of seditious sentiment. Oddly enough, our agents were unable to find any proof of sedition among the populace there. As soon as we have any updates, you will be the first to know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia glances down at her data-slate.{/n} "Lastly..."
languages.original_text: "Тем более, что удача, кажется, отвернулась от Его Светлости Винтерскейла. На нескольких его мирах вспыхнули бунты, но он, кажется, и не думает их гасить. Зато Вольный Торговец подверг жестокой расправе Везувию Секундус, одну из старейших своих колоний, которую уличил в изменнических настроениях. Странно, но нашим агентам так и не удалось найти никаких доказательств существования там ростков мятежа. Как только нам станет известно нечто новое — вы узнаете об этом перв{mf|ым|ой}". {n}Клеменциа опускает взгляд на инфопластину.{/n} "И последнее".

traits.locale_text: "Especially since His Lordship Winterscale's luck seems to be running out. Riots have broken out on several of his worlds, yet he has shown no intention of quelling them. Instead, the Rogue Trader inflicted brutal punishment upon one of his oldest colonies, Vesuvia Secundus, based on allegations of treasonous sentiments. Strangely, our agents were unable to find any proof of sedition among the populace there. As soon as we learn anything new of the situation, you will be the first to know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia glances down at her data-slate.{/n} "Lastly..."
traits.speaker: Clemence

Instead, the Rogue Trader inflicted brutal punishment upon one of his oldest colonies, Vesuvia Secundus, based on allegations of seditious sentiment. Oddly enough, our agents were unable to find any proof of sedition among the populace there. As soon as we have any updates, you will be the first to know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia glances down at her data-slate.{/n} "Lastly..."

languages.text: « D'autant plus que la fortune de Sa Seigneurie Winterscale semble s'épuiser. Des émeutes ont éclaté sur plusieurs de ses mondes, mais il ne semble pas avoir l'intention d'y mettre fin. Au lieu de cela, le libre-marchand a infligé une répression sanglante sur l'une de ses plus anciennes colonies, Vesuvia Secundus, suite à de vagues allégations de sédition. Étrangement, nos agents sur place n'ont pas pu déceler la moindre trace de troubles au sein de la population. Vous serez {mf|le premier informé|la première informée} dès que nous en saurons davantage, Votre Seigneurie. »{n}Clémentia garde les yeux rivés sur sa plaque de données.{/n} « Pour terminer... »
languages.original_text: "Especially since His Lordship Winterscale's luck seems to be running out. Riots have broken out on several of his worlds, and yet, he has shown no intention of quelling them. Instead, the Rogue Trader inflicted brutal punishment upon one of his oldest colonies, Vesuvia Secundus, based on allegations of seditious sentiment. Oddly enough, our agents were unable to find any proof of sedition among the populace there. As soon as we have any updates, you will be the first to know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia glances down at her data-slate.{/n} "Lastly..."

traits.locale_text: « D'autant plus que la fortune de Sa Seigneurie Winterscale semble s'épuiser. Des émeutes ont éclaté sur plusieurs de ses mondes, mais il ne semble pas avoir l'intention d'y mettre fin. Au lieu de cela, le libre-marchand a infligé une répression sanglante sur l'une de ses plus anciennes colonies, Vesuvia Secundus, sur de vagues allégations de trahison. Étrangement, nos agents sur place n'ont pas pu déceler la moindre trace de sédition au sein de la population. Vous serez {mf|le premier informé|la première informée} dès que nous en saurons davantage, Votre Seigneurie. »{n}Clémentia fixe sa plaque de données.{/n} « Pour terminer... »
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: “而且，温特斯凯尔大人的运气似乎越来越差。他麾下的许多世界都爆发了骚乱，然而他并没有表现出任何平息骚乱的意图。相反，这位行商浪人对王朝最古老的殖民地之一，维苏维亚次星，实施了严酷的惩罚，理由是那里的人民不太安分。但古怪的是，我们的眼线在民众之中完全没有发现任何煽动叛乱的迹象。关于这件事情，等我们得到了新的情报之后，会立刻通知您，大人。”{n}克莱门缇雅瞥了一眼她的数据板。{/n}“还有最后一件事情……”
languages.original_text: "Especially since His Lordship Winterscale's luck seems to be running out. Riots have broken out on several of his worlds, and yet, he has shown no intention of quelling them. Instead, the Rogue Trader inflicted brutal punishment upon one of his oldest colonies, Vesuvia Secundus, based on allegations of seditious sentiment. Oddly enough, our agents were unable to find any proof of sedition among the populace there. As soon as we have any updates, you will be the first to know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia glances down at her data-slate.{/n} "Lastly..."

traits.locale_text: “而且，温特斯凯尔大人的运气似乎越来越差。他麾下的许多世界都爆发了骚乱，然而他并没有表现出任何平息骚乱的意图。相反，这位行商浪人对王朝最古老的殖民地之一，维苏维亚次星，实施了严酷的惩罚，理由是那里的人民充满了背叛的情绪。但古怪的是，我们的眼线在民众之中完全没有发现任何煽动叛乱的迹象。关于这件事情，等我们得到了新的情报之后，会立刻通知您，大人。”{n}克莱门缇雅瞥了一眼她的数据板。{/n}“还有最后一件事情……”
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: 「特にウィンタースケール卿の運は尽きかけているようです。卿のいくつかの世界で暴動が起きていますが、それらを鎮圧するつもりはないようでして。それどころか、自由開拓者が卿の最も古いコロニーのひとつであるヴェスヴィア・セカンダスに、扇動的な疑いに基づき容赦ない処罰が下しました。また、奇妙なことですが、我々の捜査陣はそれらの世界の民衆が扇動された証拠を見つけられませんでした。何か新しい情報が入り次第、すぐにお知らせいたします、陛下」{n}クレメンティアはデータスレートに目を落とした。{/n}「最後にですが…」
languages.original_text: "Especially since His Lordship Winterscale's luck seems to be running out. Riots have broken out on several of his worlds, and yet, he has shown no intention of quelling them. Instead, the Rogue Trader inflicted brutal punishment upon one of his oldest colonies, Vesuvia Secundus, based on allegations of seditious sentiment. Oddly enough, our agents were unable to find any proof of sedition among the populace there. As soon as we have any updates, you will be the first to know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia glances down at her data-slate.{/n} "Lastly..."

traits.locale_text: 「特にウィンタースケール卿の運は尽きかけているようです。卿のいくつかの世界で暴動が起きていますが、それらを鎮圧するつもりはないようでして。それどころか、自由開拓者が卿の最も古いコロニーのひとつであるヴェスヴィア・セカンダスに、扇動的な疑いに基づき容赦ない処罰が下しました。また、奇妙なことですが、我々の捜査陣はそれらの世界の民衆が扇動された証拠を見つけられませんでした。何か新しい情報が入り次第、すぐにお知らせいたします、陛下」{n}クレメンティアはデータスレートに目を落とした。{/n}「最後にですが…」
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Vor allem, da Seiner Lordschaft Winterzunder sein Glück zu schwinden scheint. Auf mehreren seiner Welten sind Unruhen ausgebrochen und bisher zeigte er keinerlei Absicht einzuschreiten. Stattdessen legte {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} brutale Strafen gegen eine {mf|seiner|ihrer} ältesten Kolonien, Vesuvia Secundus, auf – wegen einer angeblich aufständischen Gesinnung. Seltsamerweise konnten unsere Agenten dort keinerlei Beweise für Aufstände durch die Bevölkerung ausmachen. Sobald wir Neues darüber erfahren, erfahrt Ihr es als Erstes, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}." {n}Clementia schaut nach unten auf ihren Datablock.{/n} "Außerdem ..."
languages.original_text: "Especially since His Lordship Winterscale's luck seems to be running out. Riots have broken out on several of his worlds, and yet, he has shown no intention of quelling them. Instead, the Rogue Trader inflicted brutal punishment upon one of his oldest colonies, Vesuvia Secundus, based on allegations of seditious sentiment. Oddly enough, our agents were unable to find any proof of sedition among the populace there. As soon as we have any updates, you will be the first to know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia glances down at her data-slate.{/n} "Lastly..."

traits.locale_text: "Vor allem, da Seiner Lordschaft Winterscale sein Glück zu schwinden scheint. Auf mehreren seiner Welten sind Unruhen ausgebrochen und bisher zeigte er keinerlei Absicht einzuschreiten. Stattdessen legte {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} brutale Strafen gegen eine {mf|seiner|ihrer} ältesten Kolonien, Vesuvia Secundus, auf – wegen Anschuldigungen verräterischer Gesinnung. Seltsamerweise konnten unsere Agenten dort keinerlei Beweise für Aufstände durch die Bevölkerung ausmachen. Sobald wir Neues darüber erfahren, erfahrt Ihr es als Erstes, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}." {n}Clementia schaut nach unten auf ihren Datablock.{/n} "Außerdem ..."
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: «Sobre todo ahora que la suerte de lord Winterscale parece haberse acabado. Se han producido disturbios en varios de sus mundos, pero no ha mostrado ninguna intención de sofocarlos. En vez de eso, el Comerciante Independiente ha castigado brutalmente una de sus colonias más antiguas, Vesuvia Secundus, basándose en acusaciones de presunta sedición. Lo curioso es que nuestros agentes no han sido capaces de hallar prueba alguna de tal crimen entre la población del planeta. En cuanto tengamos más noticias de lo sucedido, usted será {mf|el primero|la primera} en enterarse, mi{mf|lord|lady}». {n}Clementia baja la mirada hacia su tablilla de datos.{/n} «Y por último...».
languages.original_text: "Especially since His Lordship Winterscale's luck seems to be running out. Riots have broken out on several of his worlds, and yet, he has shown no intention of quelling them. Instead, the Rogue Trader inflicted brutal punishment upon one of his oldest colonies, Vesuvia Secundus, based on allegations of seditious sentiment. Oddly enough, our agents were unable to find any proof of sedition among the populace there. As soon as we have any updates, you will be the first to know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia glances down at her data-slate.{/n} "Lastly..."

traits.locale_text: «Sobre todo ahora que la suerte de lord Winterscale parece haberse acabado. Se han producido disturbios en varios de sus mundos, pero no ha mostrado ninguna intención de sofocarlos. En vez de eso, el Comerciante Independiente ha castigado brutalmente una de sus colonias más antiguas, Vesuvia Secundus, basándose en acusaciones de presunta traición. Lo curioso es que nuestros agentes no han sido capaces de hallar prueba alguna de sedición entre la población del planeta. En cuanto tengamos más noticias de lo sucedido, usted será {mf|el primero|la primera} en enterarse, mi{mf|lord|lady}». {n}Clementia baja la mirada hacia su tablilla de datos.{/n} «Y por último...».
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Özellikle de Lord Winterscale'in şansının tükenmek üzere olduğu düşünülürse. Birçok dünyasında isyanlar baş gösterdi ancak kendisi onları bastırma gibi bir niyet sergilemiyor. Hür Tacir, bunun yerine en eski kolonilerinden biri olan Vesuvia Secundus'u isyan tehlikesi iddiaları üzerine şiddetli bir şekilde cezalandırdı. Tuhaftır, ajanlarımız oradaki halkın isyana kalkışabileceği konusunda herhangi bir kanıt bulmayı başaramadı. Elimize bir güncelleme geçtiğinde bunu ilk öğrenecek kişi siz olacaksınız {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri." {n}Clementia, hızlı bir şekilde databelasına göz gezdiriyor.{/n} "Son olarak..."
languages.original_text: "Especially since His Lordship Winterscale's luck seems to be running out. Riots have broken out on several of his worlds, and yet, he has shown no intention of quelling them. Instead, the Rogue Trader inflicted brutal punishment upon one of his oldest colonies, Vesuvia Secundus, based on allegations of seditious sentiment. Oddly enough, our agents were unable to find any proof of sedition among the populace there. As soon as we have any updates, you will be the first to know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia glances down at her data-slate.{/n} "Lastly..."

traits.locale_text: "Özellikle de Lord Winterscale'in şansının tükenmek üzere olduğu düşünülürse. Birçok dünyasında isyanlar baş gösterdi ancak kendisi onları bastırma gibi bir niyet sergilemiyor. Hür Tacir bunun yerine en eski kolonilerinden biri olan Vesuvia Secundus'u, isyan tehlikesi iddiaları üzerine şiddetli bir şekilde cezalandırdı. Tuhaftır, ajanlarımız oradaki halkın isyana kalkışabileceği konusunda herhangi bir kanıt bulmayı başaramadı. Elimize bir güncelleme geçtiğinde bunu ilk öğrenecek kişi siz olacaksınız {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri." {n}Clementia hızlı bir şekilde databelasına göz gezdiriyor.{/n} "Son olarak..."
traits.speaker: Clemence
